name: Emergency Ride Home
description: Reimbursement for eligible emergency rides home (up to $125/ride, capped at $500/year)
fullDescription: Marin Commutes provides emergency ride home reimbursement for people who use alternative transportation to get to work or school, ensuring you can get home quickly in case of an emergency.
whatTheyOffer:
- Reimbursement for emergency rides home
- Up to $125 per ride
- Maximum $500 per year
- Covers taxi, Uber/Lyft, or rental car costs
howToGetIt:
1. Register with Marin Commutes before needing the service
2. Use alternative transportation (carpool, transit, bike, walk) regularly
3. When emergency occurs, take taxi/rideshare/rental car home
4. Submit reimbursement request online within 5 business days
5. Include receipt and reason for emergency
